projects.title: LaserTag++
projects.term: Capstone Project for NUS Computer Engineering
projects.description: A multiplayer laser tag game with hand actions powered by Machine Learning
projects.attribution: Handled external communications between FPGA, laptop, server and multiple mobile devices. Multicore programming on FPGA to handle concurrent streams of data.

projects.title: Geofencing
projects.description: A web application to track GPS location of specially-abled students inside the school. Made for Rainbow Centre Singapore.
projects.attribution: The GPS beacons ran on Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0 (BLE) and reported info to a base station which talked to AWS using MQTT. The data was stored in Firebase database and displayed on a web app.

projects.title: ConTech
projects.description: A contact management application for computing professionals to enhance productivity with custom fields and a UNIX-like syntax.
projects.attribution: The program was made as part of our CS2113T Software Engineering module.

projects.title: Lowkey
projects.description: Password manager and 2FA web extension to autofill passwords and OTPs, along with data synchronization across devices via the cloud
projects.attribution: The main app was made using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS. The Chrome extension was made using the Chrome API. The backend was made using Firebase.
